alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Terrell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 5:34PM CDT until October 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pecos County in southwestern Texas... Northern Terrell County in southwestern Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 534 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sheffield to 26 miles north of Sanderson, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheffield and Terrell County Gas Plant. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 317 and 327. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
